Component: primitive component involved in the crumble event
Location: World location of the crumbling cluster
Orientation: World orientation of the crumbling cluster
LinearVelocity: Linear Velocity of the crumbling cluster
AngularVelocity: Angular Velocity of the crumbling cluster
LocalBounds: Local bounding box of the crumbling cluster
Children: List of children indices released (optional : see geometry collection component bCrumblingEventIncludesChildren)
